tutorial_enemy_1.name: Tiny mouse
tutorial_enemy_1.description: A tiny, round creature the size of a palm. Its fur is white. It has a short, slightly upturned snout. Its ears are round and twitch at every sound.

shroom.name: Shroom
shroom.description: An orange-capped mushroom with a bone-white stem, roughly the size of a boot. It has small eyes concealed beneath the cap. It has no arms and very short, skinny legs. Its mouth wears a perpetual grin.

rat.name: Rat
rat.description: A greasy brown rat. Its body is muscular, and it is the size of a small cat. Its ears are scarred. It scurries around quickly.

wood_stump.name: Wood Stump
wood_stump.description: A reanimated stump of a large tree. Its dirt-covered roots act like tentacles. It has one central eye. With each step, the stump creaks. It moves deliberately.

snail.name: Snail
snail.description: A slimy creature the size of a hand. It has a large, yellow-tinted shell that swirls clockwise. Its tentacle-like antennae pull back at sudden movement.

orange_mushroom.name: Orange Mushroom
orange_mushroom.description: A large, orange-capped mushroom, the size of a big dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. It has no arms or legs—its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

green_slime.name: Green Slime
green_slime.description: A mass of green ooze. It is sticky yet bouncy, moving with no purpose.

spider.name: Spider
spider.description: A many-legged chitinous predator. It has several beady eyes that focus on you relentlessly. It scuttles with unnerving precision.

wandering_rock.name: Wandering Rock
wandering_rock.description: An ordinary boulder, covered in moss on one side, with the other side freshly scraped. The rock has been dragging itself forward.

blue_mushroom.name: Blue Mushroom
blue_mushroom.description: A large orange-capped mushroom with grayish spots, the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. It has no arms or legs; its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops as it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

octopus.name: Octopus
octopus.description: A floating mass of purple flesh hovers three feet above the ground. It has several tentacles that move sluggishly, their number unevenly spaced around its entire body.

blue_slime.name: Blue Slime
blue_slime.description: A mass of blue ooze, sticky yet bouncy, moves aimlessly with a strange, unsettling fluidity.

red_slime.name: Red Slime
red_slime.description: A mass of red ooze, sticky yet bouncy, moves with no purpose, leaving a faint, ominous trail as it shifts aimlessly.

red_cap.name: Red Cap
red_cap.description: A large red-capped mushroom with grayish spots. It is the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. It has no arms or legs; its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump

evil_eye.name: Evil Eye
evil_eye.description: A yellow worm the size of a child. It has two arms on each side. It drags itself forward, leaving a trail with its heavy tail. It has one central eye. Its mouth has several rows of square, yellowish teeth.

thief.name: Thief
thief.description: A tall cloaked figure in a battle-ready stance. Their cloak is long and dirty. They have a dagger clenched in their fist.

horned_mushroom.name: Horned Mushroom
horned_mushroom.description: A large blue-capped mushroom with grayish spots. The mushroom cap is covered in thorns the size of glass bottles. It is the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. It has no arms or legs; its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

skeleton_1.name: Skeleton
skeleton_1.description: A tall skeletal humanoid, its eye sockets empty and lifeless, its jaw loose and hanging from its skull. Each step it takes makes a loud crackling sound.

skeleton_mage.name: Skeletal Sourcerer
skeleton_mage.description: A tall skeletal humanoid wearing a thin, loosely fit robe. Its eye sockets are empty and lifeless, its jaw loose and hanging from its skull. Each step it takes makes a loud crackling sound.

mushroom_soldier.name: Mushroom Soldier
mushroom_soldier.description: A large red-capped mushroom with grayish spots. The mushroom cap is covered in thorns the size of glass bottles. It is the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. It has no arms or legs, yet it holds a shield in one spore-covered hand and a sword in the other. Its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

mushroom_thief.name: Mushroom Thief
mushroom_thief.description: A large purple-capped mushroom with grayish spots. It is the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. It has no arms or legs, yet it holds a dagger in one spore-covered hand. Its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

mushroom_mage.name: Mushroom Mage
mushroom_mage.description: A large blue-capped mushroom with grayish spots. It is the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. The cap flares out in a way that resembles a wizard’s hat, giving it a mystical appearance. It has no arms or legs, yet it holds a staff in one spore-covered hand. Its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

mushroom_cleric.name: Mushroom Cleric
mushroom_cleric.description: A large yellow-capped mushroom with grayish spots. The mushroom cap is covered in blunt thorns the size of fists. It is the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. It has no arms or legs, yet it holds a mace in one spore-covered hand. Its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

mushroom_zombie.name: Mushroom zombie
mushroom_zombie.description: A large brown-capped mushroom with grayish spots. It is the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell, mottled with patches of decay. Its cap looks ragged and weathered, as if rotting away. It has no arms or legs. Its eyes glare at you with a vacant, soulless stare. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

zombie.name: Zombie
zombie.description: A tall humanoid with purple-tinged skin, mottled and uneven in tone. Its body is gaunt, with skin stretched tight over protruding bones. Its movements are slow and jerky, accompanied by low, guttural groans.

crocodile.name: Crocodile
crocodile.description: A lizard the size of a large dog, its teeth sharp and long like knives. Its scales are rough, shifting in shades of green and brown. Its eyes gleam with a predatory gaze, and its tail flicks menacingly as it moves with a swift, unsettling grace.

skeleton_soldier.name: Skeleton Soldier
skeleton_soldier.description: A tall skeletal humanoid in rusty chainmail armor. It drags its broken sword behind it as it moves deliberately.

fairy.name: Fairy
fairy.description: A tiny humanoid creature, glowing with blue and gold light. Its soft wings flutter rapidly, barely making a sound as it hovers in place. The creature’s delicate features are faintly illuminated by its own ethereal glow.

fairy_drunk.name: Drunk fairy
fairy_drunk.description: A tiny humanoid creature, glowing with blue and gold light, sways erratically in the air. Its soft wings flutter rapidly, struggling to keep it aloft as it drifts from side to side. The creature’s movements are jerky and uncoordinated, as if it can barely control its own flight, and its glowing eyes have a dazed, unfocused look.

wood_stump_large.name: Large Wood Stump
wood_stump_large.description: A massive reanimated stump of a once-great tree, its gnarled, dirt-covered roots twisting and thrashing like monstrous tentacles. At the center of its jagged, bark-covered body sits a single, menacing eye, glowing with a fierce, malevolent light. With each deliberate step, the stump groans and creaks, sending splinters of wood into the air. It moves with a terrifying purpose, its roots slamming the ground as it advances, ready to crush anything in its path.

bartender.name: Bartender
bartender.description: The bartender cleans a mug with steady, practiced hands, the cloth moving in slow, deliberate circles. Each motion is smooth and efficient, as if the task is second nature. The mug is turned and tilted with care, the rag gliding over its surface as the bartender’s gaze shifts between the task and the room.

bar_drunk_0.name: Drunk
bar_drunk_0.description: One beer away from passing out.

bar_drunk_1.name: Wasted
bar_drunk_1.description: Someone take their saddle before they try to ride home!

tutorial_1.name: Shadowy Figure
tutorial_1.description: A tall, shadowy figure stands hunched, its crooked back casting an eerie silhouette. Long, spindly fingers twitch and curl, almost unnaturally long. The face is obscured, hidden beneath a cloak or veil, leaving only an unsettling sense of emptiness. Its presence feels like a looming threat, silent and foreboding.

boss_rat.name: Rat King
boss_rat.description: A grotesque mass of rats tangled together, their bodies fused in a twisted, writhing knot. The rats vary in size, some large and muscular, others smaller and more wiry. Their fur is greasy and matted, clumped together in patches.

guard_coward.name: Cowardly Guard
guard_coward.description: A short figure covered in leather armor from head to toe, stands hunched over their spear.

tavern_cellar_bank_robber.name: Bank Robber
tavern_cellar_bank_robber.description: A hooded figure with a tiny crowbar.

mushroom_kingdom_king.name: Mushrom King
mushroom_kingdom_king.description: A plump mushroom draped in a lopsided mossy robe shifts uneasily beneath a crooked crown made of twigs and golden spores. Their wide eyes dart nervously as they fidgets with a scepter that's clearly too heavy for them.

mushroom_kingdom_entrance_guard.name: Mushrom Guard
mushroom_kingdom_entrance_guard.description: A large red-capped mushroom with grayish spots. The mushroom cap is covered in thorns the size of glass bottles. It is the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. It has no arms or legs, yet it holds a shield in one spore-covered hand and a sword in the other. Its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

mushroom_kingdom_guard.name: Mushrom Guard
mushroom_kingdom_guard.description: A large red-capped mushroom with grayish spots. The mushroom cap is covered in thorns the size of glass bottles. It is the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. It has no arms or legs, yet it holds a shield in one spore-covered hand and a sword in the other. Its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

mushroom_kingdom_queen.name: Mushroom Queen
mushroom_kingdom_queen.description: Tall and regal, the mushroom’s smooth cap glistens with dew, a gill-fringed cloak trailing gracefully behind. They watch with calm authority, gaze steady and unreadable beneath a crown of woven roots and blooming fungi.

mushroom_kingdom_chef.name: Mushrom Chef
mushroom_kingdom_chef.description: A stout mushroom with a tall, stained hat stands proudly, its cap tilted at a jaunty angle. One stubby tendril grips a hot, crackling pan that sends up wisps of fragrant steam.

mushroom_kingdom_cook.name: Mushroom Cook
mushroom_kingdom_cook.description: A nervous, speckled mushroom half the chef’s size scurries behind, juggling ingredients in its tiny hands and trying not to trip over its own cap.

mushroom_kingdom_jester.name: Mushroom Jester
mushroom_kingdom_jester.description: A lurching, multicolored mushroom cap bounds into view, its surface a chaotic swirl of reds, purples, and yellows. It is roughly the size of a large dog, though far more animated and unpredictable. Its cap droops and curls in three distinct points, resembling a jester’s hat in both shape and whimsy. Small fungal bulbs hang from each tip, pulsing faintly with bioluminescent light.

mushroom_kingdom_citizen.name: Mushroom Citizen
mushroom_kingdom_citizen.description: A short, round mushroom with a beige cap and sleepy eyes waddles along quietly, leaving tiny spore prints in its wake.

mushroom_kingdom_wizard.name: Mushroom Wizard
mushroom_kingdom_wizard.description: A large blue-capped mushroom with grayish spots. It is the size of a large dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. The cap flares out in a way that resembles a wizard’s hat, giving it a mystical appearance. It has no arms or legs, yet it holds a staff in one spore-covered hand. Its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

daily_quest_board.name: Talking Quest Board
daily_quest_board.description: A large board sits firmly in the ground. On it, a dozen or so fliers are stapled to the board, a small crack in the shape of two lips appears to be slowly breathing in and out of the wood.

ellinia_shop_weapon.name: Wand Seller Fairy
ellinia_shop_weapon.description: A tiny humanoid creature, glowing with blue and gold light. Its soft wings flutter rapidly, barely making a sound as it hovers in place. The creature’s delicate features are faintly illuminated by its own ethereal glow.

mushroom_kingdom_necromancer.name: Mushroom Necromancer
mushroom_kingdom_necromancer.description: A huge mushroom with a blue cap and gray spots stands in the shadows. Its white stem sways as it gives off clouds of spores. One thick, spongy arm holds a staff made of old bone, covered in strange glowing symbols. Two green eyes glow from under its cap, and its wide, unnatural smile never fades. It moves by hopping, each jump landing with a heavy thud, while dark mist curls around the ground and the dead begin to stir.

ant_scout.name: Ant Scout
ant_scout.description: A dog sized ant, nimble with sharp mandables.

ant_soldier.name: Ant Soldier
ant_soldier.description: A hound sized ant with a fierce attitude.

ant_queen.name: Ant Queen
ant_queen.description: A horse sized ant with long anteni and a mind for tactics.

bee_worker.name: Bee Worker
bee_worker.description: A yellow and black stiped bee the size of a foot ball. How are they flying with such tiny wings!

bee_soldier.name: Bee Soldier
bee_soldier.description: A black and yellow stiped bee the size of a microwave.

bee_queen.name: Bee Queen
bee_queen.description: A huge bee the size of a door! this one dose not have any stripes on it.

mushroom_zombie_behemoth.name: Mushroom Zombie Behemoth
mushroom_zombie_behemoth.description: A towering, zombie-like mushroom looms with a rotting brown cap mottled in grayish spots, its eggshell-colored stem marred by patches of decay. Vacant, soulless eyes glare from beneath its ragged, weathered cap as it lurches forward in heavy, thudding hops. Despite having no limbs, its presence is monstrous and unnervingly animate.

swing.name: Swing
swing.description:
Swing at your target.
Dealing DAMAGE + 0%-CRIT% of the highest stat between GRIT and FLOW physical damage.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You lose your footing while swinging at yourself!
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You lose your footing while swinging at #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# loses their footing while swinging at themselves
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# loses their footing while swinging at you!
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# loses their footing while swinging at #OTHER#

bash.name: Bash
bash.description:
Bash your target.
Dealing DAMAGE + 0%-CRIT% of GRIT physical damage.
If you deal any damage, stun the target for DURATION turns.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You fail to bash yourself
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You fail to bash #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# fails to bash themselves
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# fails to bash you
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# fails to bash #OTHER#

smite.name: Smite
smite.description:
Smite your target.
Dealing DAMAGE + 0%-CRIT% of SOUL pure damage.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You fail to smite yourself!
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You fail to smite #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# fails to smites themselves
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# fails to smites you!
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# fails to smites #OTHER#

magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
magic_missile.description:
Cast a magic missle at your target.
Dealing DAMAGE + 0%-CRIT% MIND magical damage.

use_perspectives.you on you: You point at yourself and fire a magical missile straight to your forehead!
use_perspectives.you on other: You point at #OTHER# and fire a magical missile into their chest!
use_perspectives.user on user: #USER# points at themselves and fires a magical missile straight into their forehead!
use_perspectives.user on you: #USER# points at you and fires a magical missile straight into your chest!
use_perspectives.user on other: #USER# points at #OTHER# and fires a magical missile straight into their chest!
use_perspectives.you on you fail: You lose your concentration while gathering energy to shoot yourself in the face
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You lose your concentration while gathering energy to fire a magical missile at #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# loses their concentration while gathering energy to fire a magical missile at themselves?
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# loses their concentration while attempting to fire a magical missile at you
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# loses their concentration while attempting to fire a magical missile at #OTHER#

nudge.name: Nudge
nudge.description: The monster variant of a swing.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You fails to nudge yourself!
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You fails to nudge #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# fails to nudge themselves
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# fails to nudge you!
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# fails to nudge #OTHER#

bite.name: Bite
bite.description:
Bite your target.
Dealing DAMAGE + 0%-CRIT% of the highest stat between GRIT and FLOW physical damage.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You fail to bite yourself.
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You fail to bite #OTHER#.
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# fails to bite #USER#.
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# fails to bite you.
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# fails to bite #OTHER#.

stab.name: Stab
stab.description:
Lunge and stab your target.
Dealing DAMAGE + 0%-CRIT% FLOW physical damage.

use_perspectives.you on other: You lunge at #OTHER# and stab them!
use_perspectives.you on you fail: None
use_perspectives.you on other fail: None
use_perspectives.user on user fail: None
use_perspectives.user on you fail: None
use_perspectives.user on other fail: None

slash.name: Slash
slash.description:
Slash your target.
Dealing DAMAGE + 0%-CRIT% GRIT physical damage.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: None
use_perspectives.you on other fail: None
use_perspectives.user on user fail: None
use_perspectives.user on you fail: None
use_perspectives.user on other fail: None

mage_armor.name: Mage Armor
mage_armor.description:
Magically protect your target.
Protected targets convert BONUS% of damage received to magicka drain for DURATION turns.
If damage exceeds current magicka, damage is taken as normal.

use_perspectives.you on you: You focus a layer of magicka surrounds you
use_perspectives.you on other: You focus and a layer of magicka surrounds #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user: #USER# focuses and a layer of magicka surrounds them
use_perspectives.user on you: #USER# focuses and a layer of magicka surrounds you
use_perspectives.user on other: #USER# focuses and a layer of magicka surrounds #OTHER#
use_perspectives.you on you fail: You lose your focus
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You lose your focus on #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# loses their focus
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# loses their focus on you
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# loses their focus on #OTHER#

ethereal.name: Become Ethereal
ethereal.description:
Become ethereal for DURATION turns.
Physical damage received and dealt is cancelled.
Magical damage received is amplified by BONUS%.

use_perspectives.you on you: You focus, and begin to fade
use_perspectives.you on other: You focus, and #OTHER# begins to fade
use_perspectives.user on you: #USER# focuses, and you begin to fade
use_perspectives.you on you fail: You lose your focus
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You lose your focus on #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# loses their focus
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# loses their focus on you
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# loses their focus on #OTHER#

cure_light_wounds.name: Cure Light Wounds
cure_light_wounds.description: Heal your target for DAMAGE + 0%-CRIT% SOUL health.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You lose concentration while praying for yourself
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You lose concentration while praying for #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# loses their concentration while praying for themselves
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# loses their concentration while praying for you
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# loses their concentration while praying for #OTHER#

enrage.name: Enrage
enrage.description:
Become enraged.
GRIT is amplified by BONUS%
But ARMOR and MARMOR reduced by BONUS% for DURATION turns.

use_perspectives.you on you: You focus, and begin to fade
use_perspectives.you on other: You focus, and #OTHER# begins to fade
use_perspectives.user on you: #USER# focuses, and you begin to fade
use_perspectives.you on you fail: You lose your focus
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You lose your focus on #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# loses their focus
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# loses their focus on you
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# loses their focus on #OTHER#

mana_feed.name: Magical Feed
mana_feed.description: Transfer BONUS% of your max magicka to your target.

use_perspectives.you on you: You chant and begin to glow softly for a moment.
use_perspectives.you on other: You chant and #OTHER# begins to glow softly for a moment.
use_perspectives.user on user: #USER# chants and begins to glow softly for a moment.
use_perspectives.user on you: #USER# chants and you begin to glow softly for a moment.
use_perspectives.user on other: #USER# chants and #OTHER# begins to glow softly for a moment.
use_perspectives.you on you fail: None
use_perspectives.you on other fail: None
use_perspectives.user on user fail: None

use_perspectives.user on other fail: None

leech.name: Leech
leech.description:
Become blood thirsty, converting a BONUS% of physical damage dealt
to self healing.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You fail to concentrate.
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You fail to concentrate on #OTHER#.
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# fails to concentrate.
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# fails to concentrate on you.
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# fails to concentrate on #OTHER#.

thorns.name: Thorns
thorns.description: Reflect BONUS% of physical damage received back to attacker.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You fail to concentrate.
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You fail to concentrate on #OTHER#.
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# fails to concentrate.
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# fails to concentrate on you.
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# fails to concentrate on #OTHER#.

adrenaline.name: Adrenal Surge
adrenaline.description:
The adrenaline makes you feel alive.
Max health is amplified by BONUS% max health for DURATION turns.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You fail to concentrate.
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You fail to concentrate on #OTHER#.
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# fails to concentrate.
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# fails to concentrate on you.
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# fails to concentrate on #OTHER#.

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You lose concentration while praying for yourself
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You lose concentration while praying for #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# loses their concentration while praying for themselves
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# loses their concentration while praying for you

use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# loses their concentration while praying for you
use_perspectives.user on other fail: #USER# loses their concentration while praying for #OTHER#

beer_stein_chug.name: Chug
beer_stein_chug.description: Take a big chug, healing BONUS% of HP and MP

use_perspectives.you on you: You take a big chug from your stein!
use_perspectives.user on user: #USER# takes a big chug from their stein!
use_perspectives.you on you fail: You try to drink from your stein but spill!
use_perspectives.you on other fail: None
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# tries to drink from their stein but spills!
use_perspectives.user on you fail: None
use_perspectives.user on other fail: None

alchemy.name: Alchemy
alchemy.description:
Alchemize an equipable item, destroying the item in exchange for experience.
Experience granted is based on BONUS% of items level.

use_perspectives.you on other: #OTHER# melts in your hands, you feel it strengthen you
use_perspectives.user on other: #OTHER# melts in #USER#'s hands, they seem strenghtened
use_perspectives.you on you fail: alchemy error check config use_perspectives 6
use_perspectives.you on other fail: alchemy error check config use_perspectives 7
use_perspectives.user on user fail: alchemy error check config use_perspectives 8
use_perspectives.user on you fail: alchemy error check config use_perspectives 9
use_perspectives.user on other fail: alchemy error check config use_perspectives 10

bless.name: Bless
bless.description: Boost all primary stats by BONUS

use_perspectives.you on you fail: You lose concentration while praying for yourself
use_perspectives.you on other fail: You lose concentration while praying for #OTHER#
use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# loses their concentration while praying for themselves

use_perspectives.user on user fail: #USER# loses their concentration while praying for themselves
use_perspectives.user on you fail: #USER# loses their concentration while praying for you

tutorial_paper_1.name: A piece of paper
tutorial_paper_1.description:
This little note reads
"not all exits are obvious, some are hidden, go east to proceed"
tutorial_paper_1.ambience: A piece of paper rustles along the ground

tutorial_paper_2.name: Another piece of paper
tutorial_paper_2.description:
This little note reads
“You probably already figured it out, but loot dropped from enemies goes
directly into your inventory, you also got a weapon!
Identify it and equip it with “equip [item name]” then proceed north"
tutorial_paper_2.ambience: A piece of paper rustles along the ground

tutorial_quest_item_1.name: Mouse corpse
tutorial_quest_item_1.description: I wonder what they need a mouse for.

key_tavern_cellar.name: Tavern Key
key_tavern_cellar.description: A stickey slightly rusted key, it smells like ale.

key_tavern_sewer.name: Sewer Key
key_tavern_sewer.description: A stickey slightly rusted key, it smells like ass.

mug.name: Mug
mug.description: An empty mug, its kind of sticky.
mug.description_room: A empty mugged is tipped over

scenery_campfire.name: Campfire
scenery_campfire.ambience: @redThe fire crackles gently, its warm light dancing across nearby surfaces and casting soft, shifting shadows. The steady glow brings a sense of calm and comfort, pushing back the surrounding darkness.@back

scenery_fireplace.name: Fireplace
scenery_fireplace.ambience: @redThe fire crackles gently, its warm light dancing across nearby surfaces and casting soft, shifting shadows. The steady glow brings a sense of calm and comfort, pushing back the surrounding darkness.@back

scenery_leaky_ceiling.name: Leaky ceiling
scenery_leaky_ceiling.description: As you look up water drips on your face
scenery_leaky_ceiling.ambience: @cyanWater trickles slowly along a crack in the ceiling before slipping loose and falling. making soft plinks as it hits the ground.@back

scenery_tavern_table_carving.name: Carving in the table
scenery_tavern_table_carving.description: The carving is spelling "uck MSSP", whatever that means
scenery_tavern_table_carving.description_room: Someone has carved something into the table

tree_branch.name: Tree branch
tree_branch.description: A gnarled, weathered tree branch. The bark is rough to the touch, and small splinters protrude from its surface.

tree_root.name: Tree root
tree_root.description: This root's surface is rough and twisted, covered in patches of dirt and moss, it has a faint earthy smell to it.

scenery_ioizor_statue.name: Statue of Ioizor
scenery_ioizor_statue.description: A large marble statue of a maple legend named Ioizor.. atleast thats what it says on the plaque...
scenery_ioizor_statue.description_room: A large marble statue shadows over you

rat_hide.name: Rat Hide
rat_hide.description: The tattered rough hide of a rat

evil_eye_hide.name: Evil Eye Hide
evil_eye_hide.description: The tough hide of an evil eye

mushroom_horn.name: Mushroom Horn
mushroom_horn.description: What kind of mushroom has horns?

zombie_skin.name: Zombie Skin
zombie_skin.description: This is just disgusting to hold

red potion.name: Red potion
red potion.description: Just a bottle of cold tomato soup.

bag_0.name: Rat Pouch
bag_0.description: This abomination of stitched rat fur creates a small pouch, you can even tie the tail to your belt for easy carrying.

bag_1.name: Spider Silk Sack
bag_1.description: The spiders of kerning are known for their sturdy webs, the web spun into silk creates a lightweight and durable sack.

bag_2.name: Slimy Silk Sack
bag_2.description: A spider silk sack rubbed in some slime renders the silk even more durable and flexible.

bag_3.name: Evil Knapsack
bag_3.description: The hide of evil eyes stitched together, reinforced with the caps from horned mushrooms.

bag_4.name: Undead Crocodile Backpack
bag_4.description: Hardened crocodile scales and stitched reanimated flesh, this pack pulses faintly with unholy energy.

black raincoat.name: Black raincoat
black raincoat.description: A waterproof coat for braving harsh weather conditions

bronze chainmail.name: Bronze chainmail
bronze chainmail.description: A robust chainmail offering solid defense against attacks

brown wizard robe.name: Brown robe
brown wizard robe.description: A flowing robe, perfect for those seeking to channel magical energy

flow body 1.name: Ragged shirt
flow body 1.description: A once fine common shirt, probably endured a dozen different owners.

flow body 12.name: Night cloth uniform
flow body 12.description: Night cloth absorbs 80% of all light this dose not cover your big 4head..

flow body 6.name: Fine cloth cloak
flow body 6.description: A long black cloak of excellent quality

flow body 9.name: Rogue uniform
flow body 9.description: An iconic piece of cloth specialized for ease of movement utilizing leather straps and buckles

grit body 1.name: Leather tunic
grit body 1.description: A tunic made of cow hide, you count six spots!

grit body 12.name: Plate armour
grit body 12.description: Solid metal plates for chest, back, arms, and legs, thank god they have some padding.

grit body 3.name: Hard leather tunic
grit body 3.description: A thick tunic with fastened straps

grit body 6.name: Iron chainmail
grit body 6.description: A long shirt made of small iron rings

grit body 9.name: Steel chestplate
grit body 9.description: A solid steel chestplate, glad it fits so well

grit body 9 bone.name: Bonemail
grit body 9 bone.description: The ribcage of a large animal that elegantly envelopes the user.

mind body 1.name: Robe
mind body 1.description: A long thin dark gray robe.

mind body 12.name: Enchanted mage suit
mind body 12.description: A light purple suit with night black buttons, very stylish.

mind body 6.name: Apprentice robe
mind body 6.description: A blue robe with golden threads

mind body 9.name: Mage robe
mind body 9.description: A deep blue robe with gold engraved patterns having jewels neatly embellished

red t-shirt.name: Red t-shirt
red t-shirt.description: A casual t-shirt, more for fashion than function

soul body 1.name: Brown monk robe
soul body 1.description: A brown robe with a hint of orange.

soul body 12.name: Plastic wings
soul body 12.description: Plastic wings that are somehow better than the fine white robes.

soul body 3.name: Fine silk robe
soul body 3.description: A robe made of the finest silk

soul body 6.name: White robe
soul body 6.description: A blindingly white robe of silk

soul body 9.name: White cloak
soul body 9.description: A fine white cloak with gold linings

bronze koif.name: Bronze koif
bronze koif.description: A durable koif that offers basic protection for the head

brown wizard hat.name: Brown pointy hat
brown wizard hat.description: A pointy hat favored by novice spellcasters

flow head 1.name: Ragged hood
flow head 1.description: A ragged hood, its so beat up it looks like a mesh

flow head 12.name: Night cloth hood
flow head 12.description: Night cloth absorbs 80% of all light this is only the hood tho.

flow head 3.name: Cloth hood
flow head 3.description: A cloth hood dyed a dark gray color

flow head 6.name: Fine cloth hood
flow head 6.description: A black hood of excellent quality

flow head 9.name: Rogue hood
flow head 9.description: Now you can look cool whilst brooding in the corner of the tavern

grit head 1.name: Leather hat
grit head 1.description: A hat made of cow hide.. moo!

grit head 12.name: Bucket helmet
grit head 12.description: A metal box with some eyeholes

grit head 3.name: Hard leather helmet
grit head 3.description: The leather covers the face, kinky

grit head 6.name: Iron cap
grit head 6.description: A polished iron cap, it distorts your face when you use it like a mirror

grit head 9.name: Steel helmet
grit head 9.description: A steel helmet fit for a knight

grit head 9 bone.name: Skullcap
grit head 9 bone.description: This macabre helmet is made of the skull of a unidentifiable creature.

mind head 1.name: Pointy hat
mind head 1.description: A oversized pointed hat, a little crooked at the tip

mind head 12.name: Enchanted mage hat
mind head 12.description: A light purple top hat for the smartest and finest of gentlemen.

mind head 3.name: Fine pointy hat
mind head 3.description: A light blue tinted pointed hat

mind head 9.name: Mage hat
mind head 9.description: A deep blue pointy hat with a wide brim embellished with gold and a sapphire connected to the tip, making it curve back

mind head 9 bone.name: Bone headdress
mind head 9 bone.description: The skull of a deer, with flowers and beautiful colorful rocks attached with a series of strings made from blonde hair.

plague doctor mask.name: Plague doctor mask
plague doctor mask.description: A mysterious mask with eerie overtones, often worn by healers

red cap.name: Red cap
red cap.description: A stylish red cap that adds a dash of flair to your attire

soul head 12.name: Plastic halo
soul head 12.description: A shiny warm to the touch halo that somehow stays atop your head.

soul head 3.name: Fine silk hood
soul head 3.description: A hood made of the finest silk

event_1.name: Old coin
event_1.description:
Holding this tarnished coin fills you with an unsettling sense of both luck and dread.
«And he who sailed never reached the harbor, for the harbor was yet to come in a future patch.»
    - kuro february 3rd 2025

flow relic 1.name: Apprentice rogue emblem
flow relic 1.description: You have proved your worth, and are now an apprentice fighter

grit relic 1.name: Apprentice fighter emblem
grit relic 1.description: You have proved your worth, and are now an apprentice fighter

mind relic 1.name: Apprentice mage emblem
mind relic 1.description: You have proved your worth, and are now an apprentice fighter

soul relic 1.name: Apprentice cleric emblem
soul relic 1.description: You have proved your worth, and are now an apprentice fighter

flow trinket 12.name: Dagger necklace
flow trinket 12.description: A sleek pendant shaped like a dagger, symbolizing stealth and precision.

flow trinket 3.name: Dagger
flow trinket 3.description: A small knife perfect for offhand

flow trinket 6.name: Field dagger
flow trinket 6.description: A lightweight dagger, perfect for quick, precise strikes

flow trinket 9.name: Bag of marbles
flow trinket 9.description: A leather bag full of glass marbles

grit trinket 12 shield.name: Shield necklace
grit trinket 12 shield.description: A pendant shaped like a sword, representing strength and valor.

grit trinket 12 sword.name: Sword necklace
grit trinket 12 sword.description: A protective charm shaped like a shield, symbolizing defense and resilience.

grit trinket 6.name: Iron shield
grit trinket 6.description: An iron shield, strong yet balanced. It feels solid in hand

grit trinket 9.name: Steel Buckler
grit trinket 9.description: The pan lid of a skilled armor smith

mind trinket 1.name: Piece of paper
mind trinket 1.description: Now you can write down your spells

mind trinket 12.name: Enchanted necklace
mind trinket 12.description: An enchanted pendant imbued with arcane energy, enhancing mystical powers.

mind trinket 3.name: Notebook
mind trinket 3.description: Now you can write down lots of spells

mind trinket 6.name: Book
mind trinket 6.description: A hard leather book with quality paper

mind trinket 9.name: Ink and quill
mind trinket 9.description: A bottle of magic ink and a quill made with a large colorful feather

notebook.name: Notebook
notebook.description: A bound notebook for jotting down spells or thoughts

prayer beads.name: Prayer beads
prayer beads.description: A string of beads for meditation and spiritual focus

red scarf.name: Red scarf
red scarf.description: A scarf made of red silk

single earing.name: Single earing
single earing.description: A single earing, kinda quirky to only wear one

soul trinket 12.name: Holy necklace
soul trinket 12.description: A sacred pendant blessed with divine energy, offering protection and guidance.

soul trinket 6.name: Embellished Sigil
soul trinket 6.description: An intricately designed symbol with both elegance and power

axe.name: Axe
axe.description: A heavy axe, ideal for chopping wood or foes

curved stick.name: Curved stick
curved stick.description: A simple stick with a curved end, useful for training or basic combat

ellinia_shop_weapon_quest_1.name: Branchy wand
ellinia_shop_weapon_quest_1.description: Made from several tree branches fused together, its perfect for a beginner mage.

ellinia_shop_weapon_quest_2.name: Refined branchy wand
ellinia_shop_weapon_quest_2.description: Made from several tree branches fused together, its perfect for intermediate mages.

ellinia_shop_weapon_quest_3.name: Tree root wand
ellinia_shop_weapon_quest_3.description: Masterfully crafted from the roots of a tree, this wand is perfect for adept mages.

field dagger.name: Field dagger
field dagger.description: A lightweight dagger, perfect for quick, precise strikes

flow weapon 12.name: Scimitar
flow weapon 12.description: A curved, single-edged sword known for swift and deadly slashes.

flow weapon 12 bone.name: Bone dirk
flow weapon 12 bone.description: A dagger carved from bone, lightweight yet deadly in skilled hands.

flow weapon 6.name: Short sword
flow weapon 6.description: A perfect weapon for close combat

flow weapon 9.name: Rogue knife
flow weapon 9.description: A high-quality tactical knife with a tanto blade

grit weapon 12.name: Halberd
grit weapon 12.description: A polearm with an axe blade and spear tip, perfect for versatile strikes.

grit weapon 3.name: Spear
grit weapon 3.description: A long stick with a triangular steel tip

grit weapon 6.name: Longsword
grit weapon 6.description: A sword forged of iron with a handle wrapped in a red cloth

grit weapon 9.name: Steel longsword
grit weapon 9.description: The steel sword a knights favored instrument

grit weapon 9 bone.name: Skull flail
grit weapon 9 bone.description: A spiked flail with a skull as its head, striking fear and bone-crushing blows.

mind weapon 1.name: Stick
mind weapon 1.description: Nothing more magical than finding a cool stick

mind weapon 12.name: Staff
mind weapon 12.description: A long slender stick adorned with intricate carvings, glowing runes and a gemstone at the top.

mind weapon 3.name: Simple wand
mind weapon 3.description: A piece of driftwood that has been cleaned and carved into a wand.

mind weapon 6.name: Wand
mind weapon 6.description: A silver engraved copper rod with strange symbols engraved in the silver

mind weapon 9.name: Mage wand
mind weapon 9.description: A gold engraved sliver rod with strange symbols engraved in the gold

rusty_axe.name: Rusty axe
rusty_axe.description: This massive axe is rusted at its blade, yet sharper than most swords, your face distorts in the reflection of its rusted blade.

soul weapon 1.name: Prayer beads
soul weapon 1.description: Wooden beads on a thin thread

soul weapon 12.name: Holy mace
soul weapon 12.description: A sanctified mace imbued with divine power to smite the wicked.

soul weapon 3.name: Holy emblem
soul weapon 3.description: The emblem of a long forgotten god, whether they exist or not.. only god knows

soul weapon 9.name: White scepter
soul weapon 9.description: A silver staff with an emblem of the sun on top

soul wepaon 9 bone.name: Femur mace
soul wepaon 9 bone.description: A heavy mace crafted from a reinforced femur, brutal in combat.

mushroom_zombie_behemoth_shield.name: Behemoth Cap
mushroom_zombie_behemoth_shield.description: This large, weathered mushroom cap has hardened through decay and dark magic into a durable shield, its ragged surface still laced with faint, toxic spores.
